vote.motion-ch: FCR(2020-21)34 – PWSC(2019-20)10 工務小組委員會在2019年5月31日所提出的建議－(a)沙田濾水廠原地重置工程(南廠)－主項工程；(b)上黃宜坳食水供應系統提升工程；(c)上水及粉嶺東江水管P4改善工程；及(d)建設智管網

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2020-21)36 – EC(2020-21)5 人事編制小組委員會在2020年6月17日所提出的建議－在建築署開設1個政府建築師編外職位，以負責整體策導和監督第一個十年醫院發展計劃下醫療工程項目的推行
vote.motion-en: FCR(2020-21)36 – EC(2020-21)5 RECOMMENDATION OF THE ESTABLISHMENT SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 17 JUNE 2020 – Creation of one supernumerary post of Government Architect in the Architectural Services Department to provide overall steer and supervise the implementation of the healthcare projects under the First Ten-year Hospital Development Plan

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2020-21)37 – EC(2020-21)6 人事編制小組委員會在2020年6月17日所提出的建議－在運輸及房屋局(運輸科)開設1個總意外及安全調查員職位及1個副總意外及安全調查員職位；以及1個民航處助理處長編外職位，在常設架構下領導獨立的民航意外調查機構，以遵守國際民用航空組織持續生效並具約束力的要求
vote.motion-en: FCR(2020-21)37 – EC(2020-21)6 RECOMMENDATION OF THE ESTABLISHMENT SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 17 JUNE 2020 Creation of one Chief Accident and Safety Investigator and one Deputy Chief Accident and Safety Investigator; and one supernumerary post of Assistant Director-General of Civil Aviation in the Transport Branch of the Transport and Housing Bureau to lead the independent Air Accident Investigation Authority under a permanent set-up in order to comply with the on-going and binding requirement of the International Civil Aviation Organization

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure
